üîß Webflow Component System - Fallback Solutions

Problem: CDN links are failing with 404 errors

Solutions: Choose one of the options below to get your component system working immediately

üöÄ Solution 1: Host Files on Your Own Server (Recommended)

Upload the component files to your own server or CDN:

Step 1: Download the files

# Download these files from your local project: ‚Ä¢ dist/webflow-components.js ‚Ä¢ dist/webflow-styles.css ‚Ä¢ dist/fontawesome-config.js

Step 2: Upload to your server

Upload the 3 files to your web server or CDN (like Cloudflare, AWS S3, etc.)

Step 3: Use your server URLs

<!-- Tailwind CSS --> <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script> <!-- Component System Styles --> <link rel="stylesheet" href="YOUR_SERVER_URL/webflow-styles.css"> <!-- Font Awesome Pro Configuration --> <script src="YOUR_SERVER_URL/fontawesome-config.js"></script> <!-- Component System --> <script src="YOUR_SERVER_URL/webflow-components.js"></script>

üì¶ Solution 2: Inline the Code (Quick Fix)

Copy the component code directly into your Webflow custom code:

Option A: Minimal Setup (Just Components)

<!-- Tailwind CSS --> <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script> <!-- Component System Styles --> <style> /* Copy the contents of dist/webflow-styles.css here */ </style> <!-- Font Awesome Pro Configuration --> <script> // Copy the contents of dist/fontawesome-config.js here </script> <!-- Component System --> <script> // Copy the contents of dist/webflow-components.js here </script>

üåê Solution 3: Use Alternative CDN

Try using a different CDN service:

Option A: UNPKG

<!-- Tailwind CSS --> <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script> <!-- Component System Styles --> <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/browse-kunalkatre21-eka-ai-stack@latest/dist/webflow-styles.css"> <!-- Font Awesome Pro Configuration --> <script src="https://unpkg.com/browse-kunalkatre21-eka-ai-stack@latest/dist/fontawesome-config.js"></script> <!-- Component System --> <script src="https://unpkg.com/browse-kunalkatre21-eka-ai-stack@latest/dist/webflow-components.js"></script>

Option B: Raw GitHub (Less Reliable)

<!-- Tailwind CSS --> <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script> <!-- Component System Styles --> <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kunalkatre21/eka-ai-stack/main/dist/webflow-styles.css"> <!-- Font Awesome Pro Configuration --> <script src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kunalkatre21/eka-ai-stack/main/dist/fontawesome-config.js"></script> <!-- Component System --> <script src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kunalkatre21/eka-ai-stack/main/dist/webflow-components.js"></script>

üîß Solution 4: Check Repository Settings

Verify your GitHub repository configuration:

Step 1: Make Repository Public

  1. Go to: https://github.com/kunalkatre21/eka-ai-stack
  2. Click "Settings" tab
  3. Scroll down to "Danger Zone"
  4. Click "Change repository visibility"
  5. Select "Make public"
  6. Confirm the change

Step 2: Wait for CDN Propagation

After making the repository public, wait 5-10 minutes for the CDN to update, then try the original CDN links again.

‚úÖ Test Your Solution

After implementing any solution above:

  1. Update your Webflow project custom code
  2. Publish your Webflow site
  3. Open the published site
  4. Open Developer Tools (F12)
  5. Check Console for: ‚úÖ Component System Debug Mode Enabled

‚ö†Ô∏è Troubleshooting

If you still get errors:

  • 404 Errors: Repository is private or files don't exist
  • CORS Errors: Try a different CDN or host on your server
  • Syntax Errors: Check that you copied the code correctly
  • Loading Order: Make sure scripts load in the correct order
`; copyToClipboard(code); } function copyInlineCode() { const code = ` `; copyToClipboard(code); } function copyUnpkgCode() { const code = document.getElementById('unpkgCode').textContent; copyToClipboard(code); } function copyRawCode() { const code = document.getElementById('rawCode').textContent; copyToClipboard(code); } function copyToClipboard(text) { navigator.clipboard.writeText(text).then(() => { alert('‚úÖ Code copied to clipboard!'); }).catch(err => { console.error('Failed to copy: ', err); // Fallback const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = text; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); alert('‚úÖ Code copied to clipboard!'); }); }
